channel.title: Hand-Object Interaction on Théo Morales
channel.description: Recent content in Hand-Object Interaction on Théo Morales

item.title: A Versatile and Differentiable Hand-Object Interaction Representation
item.description: CHOIR is a differentiable representation for hand-object interaction. We demonstrate the representation’s usefulness on various tasks, including denoising and synthesis of hand-object interaction.
